description:
Empire won't be back until the end of March, but the Lyon family is already making its presence felt - what with an announcement that rapper Xzibit will guest star as Lucious' (Terrence Howard) rival and now, a trailer.《嘻哈帝国》将会在三月底回归，但是Lyon家族已经开始释放他们的影响力了——放出了一则全新的预告片。

Indeed, Lucious' seems like he'll have quite a bit on his plate this season since, when we saw him last, he'd just been disowned by his son Hakeem and dethroned as the head of Empire thanks to a sneaky coup by cougar-in-wait Camilla (Naomi Campbell.)现在的情况Lucious似乎需要静静，因为冬歇前他刚刚遭遇了儿子Hakeem的背叛，现在Empire娱乐公司的大权已经落入了Camilla的手上。

In the clip released Thursday, Hakeem looks to be at the head of the table, while Cookie (Taraji P. Henson) and ex-husband Lucious seem on much friendlier.在全新发布的预告片里，Hakeem已经坐在了主事的位置，而Cookie和前夫Lucious的关系看起来似乎好了很多。

Empire returns Wednesday March 30 at 9/8c on Fox.《嘻哈帝国》将会在北京时间3月31日回归FOX电视台。
